about.text: Hello there! I'm a dedicated Software Fullstack Developer in my mid-30s, with a passion for crafting digital solutions. My journey in the automotive sector has given me a unique perspective on the intersection of technology and innovation. What truly gets my heart racing is Fullstack Development and the art of creating seamless user experiences with Vue.js. Whether it's diving into the backend or bringing beautiful interfaces to life.

item_1.subtitle: Powerful framework that simplifies web application development, enhancing developer productivity and website performance.
item_1.title: Nuxt 3

item_2.subtitle: Popular Material Design component library for Vue.js that allows developers to easily create beautiful, responsive, and consistent user interfaces in their web applications.
item_2.title: Vuetify 3

item_3.subtitle: vue-i18n is a localization library for Vue.js that simplifies the process of adding internationalization and multilingual support to web applications.
item_3.title: vue-i18n

item_4.subtitle: ESLint is a static code analysis tool that helps identify and fix coding errors and maintain code consistency.
item_4.title: ESLint

item_5.subtitle: Prettier is an opinionated code formatter that automatically formats code for consistent and aesthetically pleasing codebase.
item_5.title: Prettier
